nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"A Beginner's Guide to Pesthunting\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Combinable in Anvil\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"When applied to armor, increases its\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Pesterminator level by \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"1\",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Can only be applied once\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"Requires Pesterminator 5\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"An old, well-used handbook detailing\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"how to wrangle various pest types.\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"Many of these pests don’t seem to\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"exist anymore - looks like someone\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"did a good job!\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"PESTHUNTING_GUIDE"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
